location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Jodhpore [Jodhpur] to William Howell Beynon

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of a letter from the Maharaja of Jodhpore [Jodhpur] and discussing the Peshwahee the previous day, his schedule in Jodhpore and his travel itinerary on leaving.The letter also references a telegram regarding a terrible accident in England on the Great Eastern Railway Line which has left nineteen people dead and thirty wounded.
